executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
CRITICAL AUTHENTICATION & ROUTING INSTRUCTIONS:

1. Authentication is REQUIRED for all Admin endpoints (TC003, TC004, TC005, TC006).
   - You MUST obtain a valid session before running these tests.
   - Credentials: email="admin@example.com", password="Admin@123456"
   - Method:
     a) GET http://localhost:3000/api/auth/csrf to extract the "csrfToken" from the JSON response.
     b) POST http://localhost:3000/api/auth/callback/credentials with form-data used by NextAuth:
        - csrfToken: <token_from_step_a> (or handle cookie)
        - email: "admin@example.com"
        - password: "Admin@123456"
        - json: "true"
        - redirect: "false"
     c) Capture the session cookie from the response headers.
     d) Include this cookie in ALL subsequent requests to /api/strategic-plan endpoints.

2. Correct API Base URL:
   - The Strategic Plan API is mounted at: http://localhost:3000/api/strategic-plan
   - Public List: GET http://localhost:3000/api/strategic-plan/public
   - Single Item: GET http://localhost:3000/api/strategic-plan/public/{slug} or /public/{id}
   - Admin List: GET http://localhost:3000/api/strategic-plan
   - Create: POST http://localhost:3000/api/strategic-plan
   - Update: PATCH http://localhost:3000/api/strategic-plan/{id}
   - Delete: DELETE http://localhost:3000/api/strategic-plan/{id}

Please REWRITE the tests to strictly follow this authentication flow and URL structure.
